title: Latin America : minimum monthly wages in 2019 , by country
yAxis: Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars for 11 number of Countrys.
The Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Country Uruguay and lowest at Country Venezuela.
There is a difference of 455.3 between the maximum Country Uruguay and minimum Country Venezuela.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars for 11 number of Countrys.
Country Uruguay has the highest Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars and Venezuela has the lowest Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars for 11 number of Countrys.
The Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Country Uruguay and lowest at Country Venezuela.
There is a difference of 455.3 between the maximum Country Uruguay and minimum Country Venezuela.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars for 11 number of Countrys.
The maximum Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars 462.3 is found at Country Uruguay and the minimum is found at Venezuela where Country is 7.0.
Second maximum Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars is found at Country Chile.
The minimum Country Venezuela has got 66.04 times less Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars than the maximum Country Uruguay.
The Country Uruguay has the highest Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars, followed by Chile, and Ecuador. Down to the Country Venezuela which is the lowest.
The Country Venezuela tends to be 1.59 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 3191.1.
